programme.desc: Watch CTI news bulletin for Taiwan's breaking news and current affairs.

programme.title: Focus New Asia Ep155
programme.desc: Coming to you at 1 PM and 7 PM on weekdays, this news program reports on both international and regional events, providing a fresh perspective on Asia and the world

programme.title: Hit the Headlines Ep71
programme.desc: This daring political talk show gives Taiwanese a voice, revealing the truth on a broad range of controversial topics.

programme.title: Play it My Way Ep86
programme.desc: This Taiwanese talkshow features prominent experts, scholars and organizations in the discussion of current affairs, controversial political news, and events moving Taiwan and the world.

programme.title: Super Followers Ep135
programme.desc: Local superstar Jacky Wu and his daughter Sandy co-host for the first time, merging the best of variety and talk for an intellectual audience.

programme.title: CTI News Global Vision Ep101
programme.desc: This news update features international news events, special analyses and dialogues from public figures. Receive comprehensive and diverse perspectives of events moving the world today.

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Problems ensue after one of two childhood friends who have vowed to become sisters through the exchange of bracelets gets married.

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: After a master passes on his magical weapon to his top student, a jealous rival goes and kidnaps the man's fiance.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: Playfulness abounds and innocence is lost in this tale of two naughty females who grow up and discover boys together.

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Li Han Hsiang brings us this delightful adventure, which revolves around Emperor Chien Lung's incognito journey through China.

programme.title: The Kid With the Golden Arm
programme.desc: Director Chang Cheh reunites the Five Venoms in his second biggest cult hit in the West, featuring Lo Meng's most memorable performance.

programme.title: Love in a Fallen City
programme.desc: This wartime drama centres on a lonely Shanghai widow (Cora Miao) and the Hong Kong playboy (Chow Yun-Fat) who decides to court her.

programme.title: Sons of Good Earth
programme.desc: This multiple award-winning film is King Hu's first solo production, a tale of the Sino-Japanese War that ends in artistic and emotional triumph.

programme.title: Asia-pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Hsuan sets out to apprehend George Eaton, a high profile thug who has escaped to Hong Kong. With home support, can Yang take him down?

programme.title: Opium and the Kung-Fu Master
programme.desc: Legendary kung fu choreographer Tang Chia's last work is one of the greatest ever, and one of Shaw Brothers' finest movies ever produced.

programme.title: Law or Justice
programme.desc: GHA Best Actress Dodo Cheng co-stars alongside Alex Man in this drama, in which a man is acquitted, only to fault again when he rapes the victim's sister.

programme.title: Lover's Rock
programme.desc: This award-winning film is Cheng Pei Pei's screen debut, and depicts life and love in a fishing village captured by two pairs of young lovers.

programme.title: Return of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: Tu Ku, having mastered the Silkworm skills, heads for Wu Tang to challenge Yun but finds him gone. However, the leader of the Ega Clan issues a challenge.

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Serio-comic clashes of cultures ensue when a Mainland Chinese family try to make a go of it in Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Treasure Hunters
programme.desc: Share the exploits of two con men vying for a horde of hidden gold. In addition to the mix is a Shaolin monk and his dangerous mute sister!

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: An insane swordsman takes to making Chinese lamps from the skin of his enemies' sisters, mistresses and wives!

programme.title: She's a Man. He's a Woman
programme.desc: There's no love lost between a plump manager & a charming lady but find themselves swapping bodies after getting struck by lightning.

programme.title: 7 Years of Night
programme.desc: One night, Hyun Su drove home drunk & accidentally killed a girl. He hid the body to cover up his crime but when the death is discovered, her father vows to have revenge on the killer.

programme.title: Bio Raiders
programme.desc: A famed doctor concocts an elixir of immortality to save his terminally ill daughter, but it involves drinking human blood. Twenty years later, the doctor's assistant makes a terrifying discovery.

programme.title: Girl of the Big House
programme.desc: Starring Francis Ng, Miriam Yeung & Yuen Chau, this action comedy depicts how a bright little girl turns the tables on her uncle who has kidnapped her.

programme.title: Forbidden City Cop
programme.desc: A huge hit in the HK, this Stephen Chow movie combines history, science fiction, martial arts & comedy elements making it a fun watch.

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: A demoted super cop who has become overweight receives a lifeline to save his career and win back his ex-fiancee when he is tasked to repatriate a Japanese fugitive.

programme.title: The Secret
programme.desc: Starring Leon Lai & JJ Lin in his acting debut, this romance depicts how the spirit of a departed wife remains a part of her family, unaware that she has died.

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Eddie Peng charms as possibly the most handsome Monkey King alongside Shawn Yue & Ni Ni in this fantasy-action-adventure film.

programme.desc: As her boss struggles to save his sinking company, underwear designer Spring finds herself up against a new employee in a race to create a new fashion line.

programme.title: Big Time Adolescence
programme.desc: A teenage boy comes of age in his dull suburban town under the destructive guidance of his best friend, a charismatic college dropout.

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: Rocky Balboa is a Philadelphia club fighter who seems to be going nowhere but a stroke of fate puts him in the ring with a world heavyweight champion.

programme.title: Rocky II
programme.desc: It's the re-match of the century as Rocky Balboa takes on Apollo Creed.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo
programme.desc: The lovable crime-fighting mutt makes his big screen debut alongside Sarah Michelle Gellar and Freddie Prinze Jr.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: A royal visit from the King and Queen of England unleashes scandal, romance and intrigue that leave the future of Downton hanging in the balance.

programme.title: My Spy
programme.desc: A hardened CIA operative finds himself at the mercy of a precocious 9-year-old girl, having been sent undercover to surveil her family.

programme.title: Just Mercy
programme.desc: The film follows young lawyer Bryan Stevenson who heads to Alabama to defend those who were not afforded proper representation or the wrongly condemned despite having his pick of lucrative jobs.

programme.title: Blinded by the Light (2019)

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep110
programme.desc: With HQ in a heatwave, it's too hot for CALVIN to play with his new cars. Luckily, it's icy cool in the Kid Cave but it turns his cars into ice balls! He must use his PLAY POWER to find a new way to play!

programme.title: Ready Set Dance S1 Ep110

programme.desc: 3 wanita bersahabat baik selalu melepak bersama tapi menyimpan rahsia tersendiri, sehinggalah masing-masing mendedahkan rahsia mereka dan berlakunya insiden yang tidak diingini.

programme.title: Buletin Utama
programme.desc: Berita tempatan dan antarabangsa yang terkini.
999 is a Malaysian investigative reality television series which focuses on crimes in the country.

programme.title: Sitik Tok
programme.desc: Akademi KOL telah memecat Cik Rona kerana hantaran di sosial media yang bertentangan dengan imejnya manakala Siti ditawarkan pangkat yang lebih tinggi di Akademi Kol. Ini menyebabkan Cik Rona marah.

programme.title: Ghaib
programme.desc: Di sebuah gua, Mimie, Jessica, Nina and Suzi menyeru roh yang menghuni di kawasan itu. Jessica yang sejak awal kurang setuju dengan rancangan itu gelisah. Kedengaran suara wanita mengilai and mereka mula takut

programme.title: The Good Detective
programme.desc: Having nothing to lose at the moment, Jeong Seok decides to bring a companion to his last journey. The shocking death of Yoo Jeong Seok stirs up the public, and the case is now under a spotlight.

programme.title: Suami Sebelah Rumah
programme.desc: Eryna and Amar hidup berjiran sejak kecil and pelajar tahun akhir di Universiti. Di kampung, Mak Non, ibu Eryna selalu bertanya khabar kerana dia menyukai Amar yang baik budi pekerti and menghormati orang tua.

programme.title: Single Terlalu Lama
programme.desc: Andy bekerja sendiri sebagai arkitek, mula terbuka hati untuk menamatkan zaman single. Di rumah pula, ibunya Habibah bising pasal kahwin juga. Andy hanya menepis seperti biasa.

programme.title: 7 Hari Mencintaiku

programme.title: Bukan Isteri Sempurna
programme.desc: Nina telah diperkosa oleh Danish Arham, kembar kepada Daniel Arman, anak Datuk Zainuddin. Demi menjaga maruah keluarganya, Datuk Zainuddin sanggup melindungi Danish and menghantarnya ke London.

programme.title: Jejak Rasul
programme.desc: Program dokumentari berbentuk ilmiah yang menjejaki peninggalan para rasul dengan paparan peristiwa yang berlaku dalam kehidupan 25 Rasul.

programme.desc: Membincangkan dan mengupas setiap surah-surah secara perinci dan memberikan latar belakang surah berserta penerangannya.
